dao.name: QRY_SOURCE_RF
dao.statement: select athena_id, source_typ, source_nam, use_sta, source_grp, modify_sta, ins_dat, ins_usr, upd_dat, upd_usr from source_rf where athena_id = ?

dao.name: QRY_GW_CUST_RF_DEFAULT_SOURCE_TYP
dao.statement: select source_typ as value, source_nam as display from source_rf where use_sta = 'Y' and athena_id = ?

dao.name: SEL_SOURCE_TYP
dao.statement: select source_typ value,source_nam display, use_sta from source_rf where athena_id = :athena_id order by source_typ

dao.name: SEL_SOURCE_RF
dao.statement: select source_typ value, source_nam display from source_rf where athena_id = :athena_id and source_typ = :source_typ

dao.name: SEL_SOURCE_RF_Y
dao.statement: select source_typ value, source_nam display, use_sta from source_rf where athena_id = :athena_id order by source_typ
